metadata.title: HABÄ°ZEN - Challenge & Habit Tracking Platform
metadata.description: Build lasting habits and achieve your goals through 30/60/90-day challenges. Join a gamified community with 126+ badges, XP system, and social features.

footer.tagline: Build lasting habits and achieve your goals through challenges and community.

home.badge_line: 126+ Badges â€¢ XP System â€¢ Social Features
home.hero_description: Join the gamified challenge platform where every check-in counts. Track progress, earn badges, and compete with friends through 30/60/90-day challenges.
home.features_description: A complete gamification platform designed to keep you motivated
home.feature_challenge_desc: Choose from 30, 60, or 90-day challenges across 16 categories. Track your progress daily with photo check-ins.
home.feature_badge_desc: Earn from 126+ unique badges across 6 types: achievement, level, streak, social, special, and bug hunter.
home.feature_xp_desc: Gain experience points for every action. Level up your profile and unlock exclusive rewards as you progress.
home.feature_social_desc: Connect with friends, see their activities, compete on leaderboards, and invite them to join your challenges.
home.feature_checkin_desc: Upload photos to prove your progress. Build consistency with streak tracking and earn bonus rewards.
home.feature_notification_desc: Stay on track with timely reminders, friend activity updates, badge unlocks, and milestone celebrations.
home.cta_description: Start your first challenge today and join thousands building better habits

features.hero_description: Everything you need to build habits, achieve goals, and stay motivated
features.story_description: Our journey that began with a local passion, together with a strong team and experienced people, is now leading a global transformation.
features.journey_desc_1: We took the first step on the path we embarked on with a local vision and passionate team, aiming to create change.
features.journey_desc_2: Strengthening in the capital and metropolis, we expanded our team with experienced professionals from all over Turkey.
features.journey_desc_3: We are building a global community with our platform equipped with modern technologies and artificial intelligence.

challenges.hero_description: Find something that excites you and start your transformation today
challenges.categories_description: Choose from 16 diverse categories to match your interests

badges.hero_description: Celebrate your achievements and showcase your progress with rare badges
badges.type_achievement_desc: Earned by completing challenges and reaching milestones
badges.type_level_desc: Unlock as you level up your profile through XP gains
badges.type_streak_desc: Awarded for maintaining consistency with daily check-ins
badges.type_social_desc: Earned through friend interactions and community engagement
badges.type_special_desc: Rare badges for unique achievements and special events
badges.type_bug_hunter_desc: Recognition for helping improve the platform
badges.meta_description: Special badges earned by completing badge collections

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: HABÄ°ZEN ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our mobile application and website.
privacyPolicy.section1_content: We collect and process the following types of personal data:
privacyPolicy.section1_item5: Device information (device type, operating system, app version)
privacyPolicy.section1_item6: Usage data (app interactions, features used, time spent)
privacyPolicy.section2_content: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.section2_item1: To provide and maintain our services
privacyPolicy.section2_item2: To personalize your experience and content
privacyPolicy.section2_item3: To process your challenges and track your progress
privacyPolicy.section2_item4: To enable social features and friend connections
privacyPolicy.section2_item5: To send notifications about your activities and achievements
privacyPolicy.section2_item6: To improve our services and develop new features
privacyPolicy.section2_item7: To ensure security and prevent fraud
privacyPolicy.section3_content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
privacyPolicy.section3_item1: With your consent or at your direction
privacyPolicy.section3_item2: With service providers who assist in operating our platform
privacyPolicy.section3_item4: To protect our rights and prevent abuse
privacyPolicy.section4_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments.
privacyPolicy.section5_content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law. You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
privacyPolicy.section6_content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacyPolicy.section6_item1: Right to access your personal data
privacyPolicy.section6_item3: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
privacyPolicy.section7_content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal data, we will delete it immediately.
privacyPolicy.section8_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacyPolicy.section9_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

kvkk.title: GDPR & Data Protection
kvkk.intro: This page provides information about your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and similar data protection laws. HABÄ°ZEN is committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring transparency in how we process it.
kvkk.section1_content: HABÄ°ZEN acts as the data controller for the personal data we collect and process. This means we determine the purposes and means of processing your personal data.
kvkk.section2_content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
kvkk.section2_item1: Consent: When you explicitly agree to the processing of your data
kvkk.section2_item2: Contract: When processing is necessary to fulfill our service agreement with you
kvkk.section2_item3: Legitimate interests: When we have a valid business reason to process your data
kvkk.section2_item4: Legal obligation: When we are required by law to process your data
kvkk.section3_content: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
kvkk.section3_item1: Right of Access: You can request a copy of your personal data we hold
kvkk.section3_item2: Right to Rectification: You can ask us to correct inaccurate personal data
kvkk.section3_item3: Right to Erasure: You can request deletion of your personal data (right to be forgotten)
kvkk.section3_item4: Right to Restrict Processing: You can limit how we use your data
kvkk.section3_item5: Right to Data Portability: You can receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
kvkk.section3_item6: Right to Object: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests
kvkk.section3_item7: Rights Related to Automated Decision-Making: You have rights regarding profiling and automated decisions
kvkk.section4_content: When we transfer personal data outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission or adequacy decisions.
kvkk.section5_content: If you have questions about data protection or wish to exercise your rights, you may contact our Data Protection Officer at:
kvkk.section6_content: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority in your country of residence.
kvkk.section7_content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie settings. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
kvkk.section8_content: In the event of a personal data breach that is likely to result in a risk to your rights and freedoms, we will notify you without undue delay and within 72 hours where feasible.
